attributes.action: ensure that people who create e-petitions know how to spell.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If you are going to create an e-petition at least get the spelling right.
Having looked through pages of petitions many have attrocious spelling mistakes in title alone.
Says a lot about the level of literacy and education in this country if citizens who are lobbying their own Prime Minister can't even spell properly!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
